thread.title: Reports: Charles Manson Moved To Hospital, ‘Seriously Ill’
thread.title_full: Reports: Charles Manson Moved To Hospital, ‘Seriously Ill’

author: Jack Davis
title: Reports: Charles Manson Moved To Hospital, ‘Seriously Ill’

organizations.name: california department of corrections and rehabilitation

text:
They destroyed our country 
Manson is currently serving nine life sentences at Corcoran State Prison for a series of murders committed by him and his “Manson Family” followers in 1969. 
Officials with the California Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation declined to comment on reports about Manson’s hospitalization. 
“We do not disclose inmate movements for safety and security reasons,” said Terry Thornton, a department spokeswoman. Advertisement - story continues below 
“It does happen that sometimes inmates are treated at local hospitals,” another spokeswoman, Krissi Khokhobashvili , said Tuesday. 
Manson, now 82, has had what the Times reported as “hundreds” of rules violations during his incarceration. 
Manson, who has been in prison since 1971, has been denied parole 12 times. His next parole hearing is not scheduled until 2027. 
The 1969 murders for which Manson was jailed included the slaying of actress Sharon Tate, who was more than eight months pregnant at the time she was killed. Advertisement - story continues below
